A statue of former Vice President John C PERIOD Calhoun a South Carolina native stands in the lobby of the Statehouse on Tuesday Jan PERIOD   in Columbia S.C PERIOD Republican South Carolina legislative leaders are unlikely this year to give permission to local governments or colleges who want to take down Confederate statues or rename buildings honoring segregationists PERIOD AP PhotoMeg Kinnard

Nathan Turoff Features EditorJune  

In recent years statues monuments and other things celebrating Confederate leaders have been facing increasing scrutiny PERIOD This also includes things explicitly and intentionally named after them like schools public offices and other things PERIOD This debate has extended to Jacksonville as well PERIOD



A few days ago the Duval County School board approved changing the names of several different schools including but not limited to Jefferson Davis Middle Stonewall Jackson Elementary and Robert E PERIOD Lee High named after the President of the Confederacy and their infamous generals respectively PERIOD



Out of the nine schools on the table for renaming only six were approved PERIOD Three of them will be keeping their names the most notable of which being Andrew Jackson High named after the controversial seventeenth President PERIOD



Many UNF students are Jacksonville natives many of whom have attended these schools PERIOD Spinnaker reached out to them on whether or not they agreed with the changes and what thoughts they had PERIOD

The majority of those polled approved of the changes with over  percent agreeing with the changes PERIOD Some of the anonymous responses were



The changes are long past due. one student said Change the names PERIOD we shouldnt honor traitors and racist slaveowners any longer. another Osprey mentioned Its a disgrace to our heritage to rename schools that have been named so for decades. for more information or news tips or if you see an error in this story or have any compliments or concerns contactemailprotected PERIOD

Nathan is a theatreenglish major at the University of North Florida PERIOD He is very interested in theatrical works and dramaturgy PERIOD His hobbies include building.. PERIOD
